name: Beowulf Classic
description:
The present version is unfinished, so expect bugs and half ideas. Although you can play the game from start to end.

After killing Cain's descendant Grendel, Beowulf embarks on a task to kill the last monster of the land, Grendel's own mother!

Inspired on the Old English epic poem "Beowulf", being one of the oldest epics written, it even inspired Tolkien on his own works.

Controls:

Arrow Keys to walk;
Up to jump;
Down to Raise Shield;
Spacebar to attack;
R to restart level;
Esc to Exit game;
